item.description:
5:30-8pm

Opus Affair West is a free social group for young professionals interested in all disciplines of the Fine Arts. There is no specific agenda or fee — just a chance to socialize over drinks, create connections within our region’s community of art-lovers, and meet folks outside your existing sphere of art-loving friends and colleagues.

Our group is intended for:
* Audience members and art fans
* Arts administrators and production staff
* Artists and performers

Arrive alone, or bring along any friends who share an interest in the arts.

Note: Individuals are responsible for running their own tabs at the bar

group.name: Northampton Web Developers/ Web Designers Meetup Group

item.name: Opus Affair West - a free social event for Artists & Art lovers
